Conditionalities should be specific to nutrition, based on best practices, including ENAs, for 
which there is evidence of efficacy. Supply-side transfers should be provided when needed in 
order to maintain quality and quantity of health and nutrition services, thus increasing the ability 
of CCTs to improve the nutritional status of mothers and children.
